Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Directs the commissioner of the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct a study on the state's COVID-19 pandemic response
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct an after-action review study on the state's COVID-19 pandemic response; directs the commissioner to submit a report on such study after 1 year and make such report publicly available on its website, and share such report with the CDC.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of the division of homeland security and emergency services to conduct a study on the state's COVID-19 pandemic response
